entry.data:
PATCHY FOG THIS MORNING
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING SOUTHWEST AROUND 5 MPH THIS AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 50
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 30 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN RAIN SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE MID 30S

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN CLEARING
HIGHS AROUND 50
